channel.title: Donater?
channel.description:
Ok i just got a cleint but it has a donater shop,
how do i make myself donater?

item.title: Donater?
item.dc:creator: @I_Hawk_I I Hawk I
item.description:
@I_Hawk_I wrote:

[quote=“lorenso, post:6, topic:301405”][CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 2871 character-posy = 3590 character-rights = 3 character-lastconnection = localhost character-special = 50 character-tz = -1 character-starter = 1 character-pouch1 = 0 character-pouch2 = 0 character-pouch3 = 0 character-pouch4 = 0 character-energy = 100 character-taskID = -1 character-taskAmount = -1 character-jad = 1 character-q1 = 15 character-q2 = 15 character-q3 = 15 character-q4 = 15 character-q5 = 15 character-q6 = 15 character-q7 = 15 character-q8 = 15 character-q9 = 15 character-q10 = 15 character-q11 = 15 character-brightness = 4 character-fighttype = 1 character-skill = 0 character-chat = 0 character-ancients = 0 character-pin = 0 character-saradomin = 0 character-retaliate = 0 character-action = 0 character-pcpoints = 0 character-assault = 1 character-donator = 0 <CHANGE TO 1 character-bow = 100 character-shield = 100
U can find this at -Source-Characters-NAMEOFCHARACTER simple ass hell[/quote]

I dont think you read what hes asking very well. If he doesnt know how to simply change shop/item/Command Right requirements… then I highly doubt he’ll be able to guess the Rights level that corresponds with the Donators rights requirement… he needs to do some searching and stop asking to be spoon fed… he just needs to remove the code that makes “Shop X” Require “PlayerRights ==#” or “PlayerRights >=#”

Read full topic

item.title: Donater?
item.dc:creator: @I_Hawk_I I Hawk I
item.description:
@I_Hawk_I wrote:

Im afraid I cant just “do it” You have to do some searching… well I am assuming that you are the “owner” of the server. Just searching for some keywords like “donator’s shop” or “donation” in client.java… its very basic stuff… youll have to have a go at it before replying again, at least show that you have searched or attempted to change it.

Read full topic

item.title: Donater?
item.dc:creator: @run_noobie_l run noobie l
item.description:
@run_noobie_l wrote:

[quote=“I Hawk I, post:2, topic:301405”]I wouldnt bother messing making yourself a donator… simply remove the code for the “donator shop” look for key words if you need help searching… like the title of the shop there should be something in client.java… and most likely use “if(playerRights >= #)” just change the “#” to 0 or if you want it as admin >=2 or owner >=3 of course this may be different depending on source or whether its a 508 etc… but it should revolve around what I have already said… just do some searching and use some general knowledge

sorry did not understand can you do for me please?[/quote]

Read full topic
